Text:
When a movie starts out as Inspired by true events.... I expect it to suck.  

Thanks for the upload!

"Inspired by true events" means nothing. If the smallest detail can be found in common, they use that crappy term. So there may have been a monk who had to deliver something thousands of years ago - true inspiration.

Vikings never wore horned helmets.
Fucking idiots.

the viking helmet pro

I am a viking and i wear horned helmets. it sucks when a sword hits the end of a horn because it makes my helmet slide off sideways and the rest of the clan laughs at me.
There were horned helmets but they were decorative, and probably only the leader wore something like that.

As soon as I saw the Viking in the horned helmet I knew two things: 
1. This movie would suck
2. There would be angry swedes raging about vikings never wearing horned helmets
I do believe the helmets among the clans were know as "Rape Hats" that they only wore when they were ready to rape everyone. The most decorative were the best at raping.
